BlackStorm::

"ALmost.... almost"said the femme while she was fighthing against the 
program while her spark was starting to fade... "YOU HAVE TO TAKE IT 
OVER ME NOW... i COULD RESIST... BUT i DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH... TAKE IT 
OUT ME OR TELL SOMEONE TO TAKE IT... QUICK!!! i CAN'T RESIST MORE..."

She continue fighitight but she didn't know how much she could reist.

In
